name: Disable 000webhost Branding
author: Nileshsinh Rathod

sections.description:
Disable 000webhost branding logo on front side.
Disable 000webhost branding logo in admin panel.
sections.installation:
=Automation Installation=
Download, install, and activate disable 000webhost branding.

=Manual Installation=
1. Download Disable 000webhost Branding.
2. Upload the ‘Disable 000webhost Branding’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…).
3. Activate Disable 000webhost Branding from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

=Automation Installation=
Download, install, and activate disable 000webhost branding.

=Manual Installation=
1. Download Disable 000webhost Branding.
2. Upload the ‘Disable 000webhost Branding’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…).
3. Activate Disable 000webhost Branding from your Plugins page.

short_description: Disable branding logo of 000webhost on your wordpress website.
